Detailed Description

Abstract superclass for all TeleKarma views.

Subclass this class to create a new view.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

View::View (  )  [inline]

Default constructor.

Initializes controller and model pointers to NULL. Note that subclasses are responsible for instantiating an appropriate model and controller.

virtual View::~View (  )  [inline, virtual]

Virtual destructor, does nothing.

Member Function Documentation

State * View::DequeueState (  )  [virtual]

Dequeues a state from the model and returns it.

Returns:
a pointer to an instance of a state that the caller is responsible for deleting, or NULL if the there have already been at least as many calls as Model#SetState(State *) calls.

void View::DoAction ( Action *  action  )  [virtual]

Enqueues an Action in the Model.

Caller should not modify the Action after enqueuing it.

Parameters:
action an action for the controller to take.

State * View::GetState (  )  [virtual]

Returns the current State of the Model.

Returns:
the current State of the Model.

virtual void View::OnStateChange (  )  [inline, virtual]

Implementation of ModelListener.

Does nothing. Subclasses may or may not wish to reimplement this method.

Implements ModelListener.

Reimplemented in TeleKarmaNG.

Member Data Documentation

The controller used by the view.

Subclasses are responsible for instantiation.

The model used by the view.

Subclasses are responsible for instantiation.
